page.title: 13APPLETON ROEBUCK CLUBS 1
page.content: {The Scouting Movement:}there are Cubs, Scouts,Guides & Brownies meeting on Thursday evenings.The boys meet at Nun Appleton theatre to play games,work on badges and learn woodcraft.They hunt rabbits and cook them.The Guides meet in the school hall to play games,do badge work and craft activities.The Brownies meet in the Parish room for similar activities.Each group has a team of adult leaders to control the high spirits. {The Tennis Club}has 3 tarmac courts at the rear of the"Shoulder of Mutton". There are 40 adult & 20 child members. There are 4 teams in the York League. Friendly matches and club tournaments are held throughout the summer. {The Good Companions}(an over 60s club) meets each week to talk,pay cards & sing in the Parish Room.They have a party at Christmas.
